- Time spent at Multiplan Center: 20 minutes
- From Multiplan Center to Sonali Bank, BUET: 10 minutes
- Time spent at Sonali Bank, BUET: 30 minutes
- From Sonali Bank, BUET to home: 15 minutes

15 minutes (Indira Road to Military Museum) + 120 minutes (Military Museum visit) + 20 minutes (Military Museum to Multiplan Center) + 20 minutes (Multiplan Center visit) + 10 minutes (Multiplan Center to Sonali Bank, BUET) + 30 minutes (Sonali Bank, BUET visit) + 15 minutes (Sonali Bank, BUET to home) = 230 minutes

- Spend 20 minutes at Multiplan Center, leaving at 5:55 PM
- Arrive at Sonali Bank, BUET at 6:05 PM
- Spend 30 minutes at Sonali Bank, BUET, leaving at 6:35 PM
- Arrive back home at 6:50 PM
